text: @NYGovCuomo You also made it mandatory that COVID-19 positives be returned to nursing homes. You and DeBlasio went on to blame the nursing homes for following your order! You and he blamed nursing home personnel for spreading the virus and for profit facilities for not caring! GTFTH!! 1/2
